titles.title: The Lord Is Near Unto The Broken Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord is near unto,
The Lord is near unto,
The Lord is near unto,
The broken spirit.
And He shall heal,
And He shall heal,
And He shall heal,
All those who seek Him with a contrite heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cry unto me in the hour of your anguish.
So shall you be free, and shall honor Me.
Cry unto me in the hour of your anguish.
So shall you be free, and shall honor Me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cercano está Jehová
Cercano está Jehová
Cercano está Jehová
a los quebrantados
/y sana también/ (3)
a los contritos del espíritu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Clama a mí en el día de la angustia
Te libraré y tú me honrarás.
